------------ Game Setup ------------
Supply cards: Chapel, Village, Fortress, Mining Village, Procession, Throne Room, Band of Misfits, Adventurer, Forge, King's Court, Copper, Silver, Gold, Estate, Duchy, Province, Curse, Colony, Platinum
